result.execSummary:
The defendant Lewis E Corder was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Forgery-Uttering [Modifiers: Repeater], a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.38(2).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Concurrent with: each other and any sentence currently serving

miscConds.notes:
Assessments/Treatment/Counseling deemed appropriate by agent.

DNA sample. 

26 days credit if revoked.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lewis E Corder

records.addlTxt: Sentence to run concurrent with each other and any sentence currently serving

2:02 PM 
Clerk Micki.
INCLUDES 22CF537 and 22CM126

State appears by DDA Molly Lawrence; Defendant appears in custody from the Chippewa County Jail via Zoom video; Attorney Paige Metzman appears in person.

Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights filed.  VRCW.
COURT advises defendant of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & questions defendant to understanding.

State moves to:
22CF537
COUNT 1 Forgery, Repeater >> DRI

COURT GRANTS.

PLEA to: 
22CF537
COUNT 2 Forgery - Uttering, Repeater >> GUILTY.
22CM126
COUNT 1 Issue of Worthless Checks (<=$2500) >> GUILTY.

COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & voluntary made, a factual basis & defendant guilty.

COURT ORDERS: 
22CF537 - Count 2: SWH for 3 years probation; CONDITIONS: Assessments/Treatment/Counseling deemed appropriate by agent; Restitution in the amount of $800.88 to Huntz Service Center (10% surcharge); CC; and DNA Sample and Surcharge. 26 days credit if revoked.
22CM126 - Count 1: SWH for 1 year probation; CONDITIONS: Assessments/Treatment/Counseling deemed appropriate by agent; Restitution in the amount of $467.99 to Peoples State Bank (10% surcharge); CC; and DNA Sample and Surcharge. 1 day credit if revoked.
To run concurrent to each other and concurrent to any other sentence currently serving.

w/Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief
Signed cash bond- money was not posted

Case Called: 10:27 am
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Davis Runde in person; Defendant appears in custody from the Chippewa County Jail, via Zoom Video, and with Atty Paige Metzman in person.
VRCW.
Waiver of Prelim. filed.  
Court questions deft as to waiver.
Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made.
COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial.  
Information to be E-filed.  Reading Waived.
Plea: NOT GUILTY
Bond: Continued.

Jury Trial 07/27/2022 @ 9:00 am

C: Br. 1

Adj: 10:30 am

Review hearing on June 1, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Preliminary Hearing on June 6, 2022 at 09:30 am.
